Max Liebel is a student assistant at the Chair of Information Management. He has been studying Library and Information Science in combination with Classical Archeology since 2022. Previously he was a student assistant at the DESY-Institution located in Zeuthen and collaborated with researchers at PITZ.

[Profile](https://www.ibi.hu-berlin.de/de/institut/personen/liebel/dienstangaben) \@hu-berlin.de
